body_html:
The lastest one I failed with is several days ago, around last Friday or the weekend.

After that I got tired of it and simply throw something like

until cmake --build .; do :; done

into my script to bypass the issue.
body_text:
The lastest one I failed with is several days ago, around last Friday or the weekend.
After that I got tired of it and simply throw something like
until cmake --build .; do :; done

into my script to bypass the issue.
body:
The lastest one I failed with is several days ago, around last Friday or the weekend.

After that I got tired of it and simply throw something like
```
until cmake --build .; do :; done
```
into my script to bypass the issue.
